summary: Why the beam wouldn't level up as you do? Dealing 30 damage all the time is really underpowered.
descriptionHtml:
If you have the Dragonborn DLC, probably you have finished the Bloodskal Barrow quest? The bloodskal blade beam always deal a ridiculously low 30 damage, the beam was awesome , but it deals 30 damage only, which is useless mid to late game.

Now I have created a better version of the beam, which levels up as your [b]Two-Handed[/b] skill does. That said, the higher your Two-Handed skill, the higher the damage the beam will deal. Be ready to love your Bloodskal Blade when you have installed this mod!

Damage Table(Two-Handed Skill - Damage)
0 to 30: 30
31 to 40 : 40
41 to 50 : 50
51 to 60 : 60
61 to 70 : 70
71 to 80 : 80
81 to 99 : 90
100+ : 100

Test done on Forsworn Briarheart(44313) [b]WITHOUT[/b] perks(Two-Handed Skill - Damage)
15 - 17
100 - 55
author: falco99
